programme.title: Burst City
programme.desc: Punk bands protest a nuclear power plant and are attacked by yakuza thugs until a pair of metal-clad bikers arrives.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Underdog
programme.desc: A gangster (Kôji Tsuruta) makes powerful enemies after taking over the liquor trade.

programme.title: Burst City
programme.desc: Punk bands protest a nuclear power plant and are attacked by yakuza thugs until a pair of metal-clad bikers arrives.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Underdog
programme.desc: A gangster (Kôji Tsuruta) makes powerful enemies after taking over the liquor trade.

programme.title: Bronx Executioner
programme.desc: A futuristic sheriff and a rebellious replicant join forces to stop the destruction of New York by warring androids.

programme.title: Five Deadly Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master sends his last student to check up on five former pupils, who each know a special style of kung fu.

programme.title: Avenging Boxer
programme.desc: A youth studies the martial arts in order to avenge his father's death and retrieve a sacred golden plate.

programme.title: Faster Blade: Poisonous Darts
programme.desc: Rival gangs pursue a noble thief.

programme.title: Bruce Lee the Invincible
programme.desc: A kung-fu student (Bruce Li) tries to find a wayward classmate after he joins a group of militarists.

programme.title: Fire Twister
programme.desc: An explosion creates a swirling mass of flame, but the destruction it wreaks appears to be controlled by a human plan.

programme.title: Earthfall
programme.desc: As a massive asteroid heads through the solar system, its gravitational forces pull Earth in its wake and cause many casualties.

programme.title: Ice Twisters
programme.desc: Charlie Price (Mark Moses), a former scientist who writes science-fiction novels, starts living one of his plots when a government weather experiment turns into a disaster.

programme.title: Polar Storm
programme.desc: A scientist must save the day when violent storms threaten Earth's magnetic poles.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.desc: Two couples spend the holiday in a cabin hoping to reconnect; when a masked snowman terrorizes them, the family must fight to make it to morning.

programme.title: Gamera: The Giant Monster
programme.desc: American and Japanese military officials join forces to remove a fire-breathing monster from the Pacific islands.
